page.title: 06MARWOOD S. EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the people who live in this block work in Barnstaple.The most important industry in the area is farming which in some parts is quite intensive.None of the farms are large enough to employ more than one or two extra people.}Building is the next most important industry but again there are no large firms and most builders are either self_employed and work on their own or employ 2 or 3 others. Cars are essential for getting around and there is a self_employed mechanic in Prixford with his own workshop.There is only one post office and public house. Some families take in visitors during the summer and tourists do come to Dr.Smart's gardens and vist Marwood Church as well.
